4301040.name: AshenGaurd
4301040.description:
Something long forgotten has returned to AshenGaurd. Adikshun is free from its prison once more and is determined to take control unbeknownst to the world. Is there anyone left in this world that will be able to stand against this ageless evil? 

A man awaking in a cave void of his memories. A simple journey to discover his lost memories, reveals something far more sinister is taking place. Will he be able to unravel the mysteries and save himself and AshenGaurd?

Join the main Character in this action-packed adventure! Along the way you will meet many friends that will join you in your Quest. Each bringing something different to the party. This story promises to be one for the ages!

  • AshenGaurd is a turn-based RPG. It makes use of Quick Time Events. This Iteration is made in RPG Maker MZ.

  • Take part in mini games that aren't just a distraction, but beneficial to the main adventure with some even being mandatory for progression

  • Exploration is key to any Adventure. AhenGaurd is no exception. Search your surroundings carefully, you never know what you might find. One woman's "junk" may be another man's treasure.

  • Every party member brings some special ability, that will help you traverse the world. 

  • This game is "Old School" Taking you back in time to the struggle of yester-year! Dedicated save point. No auto-save here! Oh, the nostalgia!
4301040.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
